stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: The first thing she told us on the first day of lecture was "come when you can." So that should give you an idea as to how much the lecture part of J2100 matters. The way she weights grades is beyond me. If you miss one out of-class-assignment, your grade will drop two letters. Even though we have probably 100 assignments throughout the semester.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SO MANY PAPERS  RESPECTED
comments: You will not get an A in this class, and chances are, you will not get a B in this class. Horvit is a great professor, but she is the toughest grader I\'ve ever had. However, the course is great. You will become a better writer, and you will learn so much from her. But, do not underestimate J2100. One poor paper can and will kill your grade.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Horvit is challenging. I wouldn\'t choose her over others because she assigns you things others aren\'t. Other sections don\'t follow a specific beat and we move more fast paced. She doesn\'t allow MU sources either, like other lab sections do. BUT you will learn a lot and become a lot better of a journalist if placed in her class. She\'s not that bad.

comments: She\'s tough but great. Take her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Dr. Horvit is an outstanding professor. I had her for J-2100 News Writing lab. Her class was challenging; it was hard work; and it was stressful; however, Dr. Horvit prepares you for the J-School. She was an outstanding instructor, very approachable, and very pleasant. I would love to take another, more challenging class taught by her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: J4628 isn\'t a blow-off class by any means. Horvit signs a massive amount of reading for each class period, & reading is a must because class is small & entirely discussion-based. If you do not read, she will notice which will hurt participation. You\'ll do OK as long as you read & prepare something to say. Beware of those brutal pop quizzes!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Had horvit only for lecture. let me tell you 2100 is HARD. they said that 1100 was a "weed out class" it wasn\'t. this is it. I put in all the effort i could never missed a class etc and still received a C. It definitely depends on your TA though.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Beverly is great. She is tough but her critiques will significantly improve your writing. She is not mean spirited and is always willing to help you out. Office hours (especially for AP style corrections) are highly recommended.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She\'s tough, you probably won\'t get an A in her class - but it\'s worth it. You will learn so much and really become a better journalist.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Her class is relatively easy, but most of the time her questions make absolutely no sense. Coming to class is worthwhile because we have a lot of great speakers and the topics they discuss will be on the test. The tests aren\'t bad if you come to class and do all the readings, and she basically emails you telling you what\'s on the test.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She has no direction. She\'s very redundant and vague and offers no reason to listen to her. She assigns large amounts of reading that are hardly worth anything. Be prepared to be frustrated, especially by her tests and final project. I would recommend not taking her class, but it\'s required for journalism students, which is unfortunate.

comments: she means well and is a nice lady...but definitely lacks as a teacher. i pity myself for taking her class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The most boring teacher EVER. I wanted to scream during every class because she is SO ANNOYING. I didn\'t learn anything because the class is pointless, unfortunately journalism students must take it. And you have to go to class because she takes attendance with clickers.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I believe this was her first time teaching Principles. I felt she did an excellent job. She made sure to cover all the emphasis areas, and really focused on class input to fuel class discussions. She seemed to care a lot about student learning, and was easy to get ahold of if you had questions.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Horrible teacher, horrible grader. Takes off points for no reason until you reach 50/100 at which point she stops grading. Don\'t learn anything in the class either.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She seems clueless when it comes to teaching - I think she finds it amusing when her students fail her quizzes. I think my little cousin could teach the class better.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I wish I would have read comments before I took her class. All I have to say is that I agree she is NOT a teacher. Sure she knows correct grammar, ap style, an has good writing skills but Lack tremendously as a teacher. Very boring monotones voice not to friendly unless you break the ice first. HER HUSBANDS CLASS IS GREAT THOUGH.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Absolutely clueless when it comes to teaching. She was always cold and unapproachable. She knows grammar and journalism, sure, but she\'s not cut out to teach. I always felt like I was intruding on her whenever I came to her office or asked her a question. Terrible. Terrible. Terrible. Avoid at all costs! I MEAN ALL COSTS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (5)  SO MANY PAPERS (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Horvit is annoying. She teaches J2000 like it is a middle school class and rarely listens to what students have to say. The class content is boring, and Horvit dumbs it down even more. She also assigns a useless amount of reading.
